content:
User: Strategic Implications: The charter’s autonomy focus is validated by Grok’s performance. Monetization (Segment 2) and investor engagement (Segment 4) need sharper execution to hit financial goals ($15K/month Jesse, $10K/month compute).

Grok: Next Steps: Refine tagging for scalability (e.g., automate #EMOTIONS_POS detection), test Grok as CEO (Segment 2 idea), and leverage X momentum to secure charter-aligned funding.
